Articles.Content: Hello! I figure I should introduce myself as I will probably be posting alot. I am very interested to see what this game can do, as I played it alot in the early developmental stages. That\'s abot all I can think of, as it is 2 in the morning. But, other than that, I hope to have a good time, and minimal karbal\'s KIA.

Hi and congrats on your first post!

Don\'t forget the forum while playing, and post furiously! It is really a great community!

Cheers,

-A guy who posts like a mod

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
